title: Gauley River National Recreation Area: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia        Gary Hartley          Photo Gallery Check the photo gallery for a collection of images taken throughout Gauley River National Recreation Area.         Multimedia Presentations The Multimedia Presentations page includes videos that cover a variety of park resources.         YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCfd7VDtNzRBpWGxSFgON_g Visit the official Gauley River National Recreation Area YouTube channel to see videos created by park rangers highlighting the park and running the river.          Social Media Join the conversation and stay connected with what is happening at New River Gorge National River, Bluestone National Scenic River, and Gauley River National Recreation Area. Learn about your parks, keep up to date on park events and programs, and share your experiences through our social media pages. more...
